about_the_game:
"Tablets of Power" is a traditional active turn-based RPG that blends classic fantasy with a dash of modern-day humor, creating a rich narrative into its storytelling. Here, your epic adventure collides with the unexpected, leaving you to ponder the very fabric of your world.

The Story? Oh, Just Wait:

What starts as a straightforward quest soon unravels into the discovery of a sinister plot for global domination by a shadowy group. Each character is personally affected by this clandestine organization, whether through manipulation, direct threats to their loved ones, or the theft of their own powers, making the journey not just about saving the world, but also an intensely personal battle for redemption and justice.

You're tasked with stopping these villains to prevent the end of the world or, dare I say, the apocalypse. Along the way, you'll encounter interdimensional beings, aliens, and even venture into the astral realm, all in pursuit of the mystical Tablets of Power. This game isn't just another adventure; it's an emotional journey that combines epic, universe-spanning conflicts with intimate, personal stories. Expect to laugh, gasp, and maybe even ponder the very fabric of your world as you play. It's as if "The Lord of the Rings" had a crossover with "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy," and together they birthed this unique RPG.

STOP THE ONE ORDER FROM WORLD DOMINATION!

Tablets of Power - A story so wild, so close to home, you won't believe it's a game! Where the charm of retro 32-bit pixel art meets the epic saga of a world hanging in balance. Dive into a retro-inspired RPG adventure that promises not just a game, but a journey through time, magic, and a story you will absolutely never forget!

The Fate of Gaia

A thousand years have passed since the great battle where the Tablets of Power saved Gaia from an interdimensional nightmare. These relics, once hidden for safety, are now the center of a looming apocalypse. A cult, the One Order, seeks these tablets to establish their dominion. As the world teeters on the brink, 8 hero's must stop this cult from finding these tablets before it's too late.

A Tale Woven with Magic

Embark on a quest where every step unravels more of an intricate story filled with unforgettable plot twists. From quaint beginnings, journey through a narrative that expands into an open world teeming with secrets, side quests, and stories.

Characters of Legend

Meet a roster of heroes, each with their own deep backstories and pivotal moments that will make you laugh, cry, and cheer! From the mysterious sorceress with a forgotten past to the rogue mercanary seeking redemption, every character adds depth and color to your journey. Your party isn't just a group of fighters and wizards; they're a family forged in the fires of adventure!

Power of the Ancients

Search for the Lost Tablets of Power scattered across the realm. Each tablet not only teaches you potent spells but also holds a piece of history, waiting for you to unlock its secrets.

Craft Your Combat

Engage in an active battle system where resources, strategy and skill matter. Build your abilities, learn from each encounter, and customize your approach to battle, whether through stealth, equipped relics, sorcery, or sheer strength.

An Expansive World

After an initial guided story, the map expands into a tapestry of diverse landscapes—venture through haunted mountains, delve into the depths of puzzle-laden dungeons within ancient ruins, and navigate through realms where each step brings new mysteries and monsters. From forests to the tundra, from the desert to the amazon, from an alien world to the astral plane; engage in side quests and explore these maps to unravel the rich lore of Gaia.

Unleash Your Adventure

Dive into nostalgia! In Tablets of Power, every pixel pulsates with potential, every character has a story to tell, and every player writes their legend. The fate of Gaia rests in your hands. Will you rise to become its savior or will the One Order's dark ambition prevail?

The Colosseum of Champions

Prove your worth in the famed Colosseum, a place where only the bravest dare to fight. Here, victory brings glory, rare items, and the chance to become a legend.

Treasures and Triumphs

Battle hundreds of unique monsters, hunt for treasures, equip powerful relics for additional abilities, and find stat-boosting items to enhance your prowess.

DOWNLOAD NOW

and let your pixelated odyssey begin. Remember, in this world, legends are not just born; they are pixelated!

Note: Ensure your device is ready for an epic quest. Adventure awaits, and with every tap, a new story unfolds. Embrace the power, hero, for Gaia calls upon you!

Designed for Mobile, ported over to Desktop!

name: Tablets of Power

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything capable of producing sound.

reviews:
“A cult classic!”
10/10 – Alex

“Dude, you put me in a game. NICE!”
10/10 – Tony

“Pfft...”
9/10 – Nathan
short_description: Active turn-based RPG. with a wild story that hits to close to home, you won't believe it's a game! A tribute to the RPG adventures that shaped your gaming life. For those who've been waiting for a return to the RPG golden age, your wait is over! Designed for Mobile, ported over to Desktop!
